# [Interview #301: Robert Jordan's Blog: Steady as she goes, Entry #2](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=301#2)

#### Wilson Grooms

For Janice. Prayers offered for your Peace Officer as he also fights this awful disease.
